Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Cincinnati to Los Angeles on 6/1/1988 (Going to LAD: C Terry McGriff. Going to CIN: C Tim Laker)...
Had first career hit on 7/27/1988, off Mike Jackson (PHI)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1988...
